events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your website, but it arrived in the wrong size. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for a refund due to the wrong item size.
Assigning the case to the refund support team specialist to handle the customer's refund request promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear that you received the wrong size. I am here to help you process a refund quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and with original tags? This helps us proceed with your refund.
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 123456789 and the jacket is still unused with all original tags attached.
Great! We will initiate the refund process immediately. Please use the prepaid return label sent to your email to send the jacket back.
Thanks for the solution. I appreciate the prepaid label and quick help with this issue.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5 business days.
Just following up to ensure that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Thank you for your confirmation. We are closing this case now. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
